products.title: Harper Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Their harper range comes in several soft, almost metallic, shades with a light leafy, fern pattern. Product id: db-rom0946 fabric colour: linen material: 54% polyester / 46% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes harper linen roman blind in cream.
